alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 8:14PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sweetwater County through 900 PM MDT... At 813 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles north of Wamsutter, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, penny size hail and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wamsutter. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 171 and 180. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Riverton.
